response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $8,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to own this remarkable product at a special introductory price of $10,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this investment in excellence. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 10000}
